content.rendered:
Drift Hunters unblocked

Drift Hunters unblocked WTF is a free-to-play, browser-based drifting game that puts you behind the wheel of cars like the Toyota AE86, Nissan S13, Toyota Supra, Ford Mustang, and even the RWB 911. It’s nowhere near as in-depth as your modern-day PC and console games, but you can tune and customize your car to an impressive level. Since it’s based on the UNITY engine, it does offer 3D graphics and the physics are somewhat realistic.

How to Play Drift Hunters

Gameplay is relatively simple. Use your keyboard’s ARROW KEYS to control the vehicle, the SPACEBAR to engage the handbrake, C to change the camera view. Left Shift and CTRL to upshift and downshift, respectively. While the handbrake is usually useful in games like this, you might find that you don’t need it as steering alone is usually enough to introduce a pretty wicked drift.

Car drifting simulator

Enjoy drifting & driving awesome cars. Explore beautiful maps, find your favourite drift locations. Do experiments with car tuning. And join the Drift Hunters community!

Drift Hunters Top Speed

DriftHunters Top Speed will make your ongoing interaction significantly better. You can fight with the dragon you need, as you will have them all opened. As it is a well-known game, it has in excess of 100 million players, so it will be difficult for you to get truly outstanding. You should invest a ton of energy and cash.

Drift Hunters 2 : Is It Better Than Drift Hunters? + Gameplay

Drift Hunters unity

Drift Hunter car list on unity :

  • Toyota Trueno GT-APEX (AE86)- Datsun 240z
  • Nissan 240sx (S13)
  • BMW M3 (E29)
  • Mitsubishi Evolution (VIII)
  • Subaru Impreza WRZ
  • BMW M3 (E36)
  • Nissan 240sx (S14)
  • Nissan Silvia Spec R (S15)
  • Honda S2000 (AP1)
  • Mazda RX-7 Type R (FD3S)
  • BMW M3 (E46)
  • Toyota GT86
  • Toyota Supra (JZA80)
  • BMW 1M Coupé (E82)
  • Infiniti G35 Coupe
  • Mercedes Benz AMG CLA Saloon (C45)
  • Ford Fiesta ST (Mark VI)
  • Nissan 370z Coupe
  • Nissan Skyline GTR (R34)
  • Lexus IS350
  • Dodge Challenger Hellcat
  • Ford Mustang Fastback (S550)
  • BMW 335i (F30)
  • Nissan GTR (R35)
  • Porsche 911 GT (993)

Drift Hunters max

Drift Hunters MAX is the ultimate drifting browser game online. So, it’s time to get behind the wheel and begin smoking your tires!

Drift Hunters unblocked for school proved itself the most popular game in the Drifted Games arcade, so we asked you, the fans, how we could improve upon the Classic version, and Drift Hunters MAX was born.

Drift Hunters crazy games

Best free drifting game on the internet! Drift cool cars on smooth racetrack.

Drift Hunters is a free-to-play, browser-based drifting game that puts you behind the wheel of cars like the Toyota AE86, Nissan S13, Toyota Supra, Ford Mustang, and even the RWB 911. It’s nowhere near as in-depth as your modern-day PC and console games, but you can tune and customize your car to an impressive level. Since it’s based on the UNITY engine, it does offer 3D graphics and the physics are somewhat realistic.

Drift Hunters 2

The best drift game on web is back with a new sequel. The wait is finally over! Drift on 5 stunning tracks and make smooth drifts to make your highest score. Get to make long and smooth drifts as the sequel offers significant physics improvement. You can also tune your drift car according to your own playability. With this new sequel, There is significant changes in the graphics of the game and the game looks really realistic. You can now customize your car completely to your taste and drift in style. It has some major improvement over its last sequel Drift Hunters. Are you ready to prove that you are the best drifter!

Popular drift game and car game

  • Rocket Soccer Derby
  • Merge Round Racers
  • Top Speed 3D
  • Adventure Drivers
  • Merge Gangster Cars
  • City Rider
  • Real Cars in City
  • Demolition Derby Crash Racing
  • City Car Driving: Stunt Master
  • Cyber Cars Punk Racing
  • 3D Car Simulator
  • Grand Prix Hero
  • Fortride: Open World
  • Offroader V5
  • Parking Fury 3D: Beach City
  • Burnin’ Rubber Crash n’ Burn
  • TinyTownRacing
  • Stunt Car Challenge 3
  • Super Racing GT: Drag Pro
  • Downtown 1930s Mafia
  • Highway Racer
  • Super Star Car
  • Car Crash Simulator Royale
  • Truck Simulator: Russia
  • Wrong Way
  • DashCraft.io
  • Car Simulator: Crash City
  • City Car Driving Simulator: Stunt Master
  • Burnin’ Rubber 5 XS
  • Blocky Demolition Derby
  • Death Chase
